original_text: My root was spread out by the waters, and the dew lay all night upon my branch.
korean_text: 내 뿌리는 물로 뻗어나가고 이슬이 내 가지에서 밤을 지내고 갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: My root was spread out by waters
and the dew lay all night upon my branch
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이슬이 밤새 내 가지 위에 머물렀습니다
